Package net.joala.condition

Interface Summary
BooleanCondition Specialized condition for boolean states (true/false).
Condition<T> A test condition to wait for using a given timeout.
ConditionFactory Interface for factories providing conditions.
Expression<T> An expression is handed over to conditions to be evaluated again and again.
FailSafeCondition<T> Condition which ensures that a runnable is executed after the condition has been performed.
Timeout A timeout which can be converted to different time-units.
 

Class Summary
AbstractExpression<T> Convenience abstract implementation of Expression which has an empty implementation of AbstractExpression.describeTo(Description).
DefaultBooleanCondition  
DefaultCondition<T> An abstract implementation for conditions.
DefaultConditionFactory Default implementation of ConditionFactory.
TimeoutImpl Implementation of Timeout.
 

Exception Summary
ConditionTimeoutException Exception which signals that a condition is not fulfilled within time.
ExpressionEvaluationException This exception is thrown by Expression.get() when the expression cannot (yet) be computed and contains a root cause.
